solution_line_template: To travel from New Orleans to New York, Sue took {fraction_new_orleans_to_ny} * {time_ny_to_sf} hours = <<{fraction_new_orleans_to_ny}*{time_ny_to_sf}={time_no_to_ny}>>{time_no_to_ny} hours.

If she stayed in New York for {time_in_ny} hours, Sue's total time to travel from New Orleans to San Francisco is: {time_no_to_ny} hours from New Orleans to New York + {time_in_ny} hours in New York + {time_ny_to_sf} hours from New York to San Francisco = <<{time_no_to_ny}+{time_in_ny}+{time_ny_to_sf}={total_travel_time}>>{total_travel_time} hours.
